overview:
As an entrepreneur, Dan Tasset has used his business success to inspire and drive change in healthcare around the world. In the United States, Dan used his experience working with physicians to develop surgery centers and surgical hospitals to create Nueterra (http://www.nueterra.com/) and make it a leader in developing and managing physician-owned surgical facilities.

Leveraging his entrepreneurial success, Dan founded the One5 Foundation (http://www.dantasset.com/one5.html), which brings healthcare and other resources to people in developing nations who are living in extreme poverty. The One5 Foundation gives them the opportunity to develop those aspects of their lives that are integral to achieving their dreams. The One5 Foundation lifts up people living in poverty so they can succeed educationally, occupationally, relationally, financially and spiritually so they will, in turn, become leaders and enrich their communities and countries.
